fields.name: Branch Manager
fields.description: Manages branch operations, staff, and has full control over branch-level activities

fields.name: Regional Manager
fields.description: Oversees multiple branches in a region, manages branch managers, and regional policies

fields.name: Loan Officer
fields.description: Handles loan applications, appraisals, and customer interactions for pawning

fields.name: Senior Appraiser
fields.description: Expert in valuation of items, particularly jewelry and precious metals

fields.name: Cashier
fields.description: Handles cash transactions, payments, and basic customer service

fields.name: Inventory Manager
fields.description: Manages and tracks pawned items, maintains inventory records

fields.name: Customer Service Representative
fields.description: Handles customer inquiries, complaints, and general assistance

fields.name: Security Officer
fields.description: Maintains security of premises, staff, customers, and valuable items

fields.name: Finance Manager
fields.description: Manages financial operations, reporting, and compliance

fields.name: IT Administrator
fields.description: Manages system access, technical infrastructure, and software maintenance

fields.name: Compliance Officer
fields.description: Ensures regulatory compliance, audits operations, and maintains policies
